base_description: Rectangular gray cabinet with two doors.
part_description: Consists of two doors with handles and two drawers on top. Rectangular shape with smooth surface, positioned symmetrically.
internal_interaction_description: The doors open outward and are hinged to the sides, allowing access to the interior storage space. The drawers slide horizontally, providing additional storage above the main cabinet area.
external_interaction_description: Designed to store items, the cabinet can be placed against a wall, under a countertop, or in a kitchen. It interacts with users through the opening of doors and drawers to access stored items.
